content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a suggested price of 950 Euros per month. However, I am quite flexible in negotiations and open to hearing your proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your flexibility. Considering it's an unfurnished apartment, I was thinking of an amount around 750 Euros per month. It's a fair price, considering the average market price in Magdeburg for unfurnished apartments.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation for this newly built, centrally located apartment was significantly higher.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I'll start with a price closer to my initial expectation. How about 850 Euros per month, considering the quality of the apartment and its central location?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 850 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
